name: Best Free Keylogger Log File
summary: A KELGFILE is a log file created by Best Free Keylogger, a utility used to monitor what users do on a computer. It may contain keystroke records, Internet activity, captured screenshots, clipboard activity, chat messages, entered passwords, applications opened, and dates & times. KELGFILE files are used to send reports to the administrator of the activity on the computer being monitored.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
